programme.title: Crime of Love
programme.desc: The beautiful Carmela, a girl of Sicilian descent who arrived in the North with her parents, falls in love with the Milanese Nullo, a work colleague. But their relationship must come to terms with the difference in the two's views: he is of anarchist ideas while she is deeply religious.

programme.title: Confessions of a lady cop
programme.desc: A young woman rises through the ranks of the police force while navigating personal challenges.

programme.title: Provocation
programme.desc: Vanessa, widowed at a young age, lives with her step-daughters Kikki and Vivi in a luxurious villa on the island of San Pietro. They have recently moved in with Roberto, a professor and former lover of Vanessa's, who is in charge of giving private lessons to the two girls in preparation for their high school exams. Inside the mansion there is constant tension, a climate of hatred in which the man will become involved despite himself with increasingly tragic consequences.

programme.title: Nightmare City
programme.desc: An airplane exposed to radiation lands, and blood drinking zombies emerge armed with knives, guns and teeth! They go on a rampage slicing, dicing, and biting their way across the Italian countryside.

programme.title: Wax: We Are The X
programme.desc: Gripping road movie, starring Rutger Hauer and Andrea Sartoretti. Two 30-year-old Italians and a Frenchwoman, after years of precariousness, go to the French Riviera to shoot a commercial and have one week to complete the assignment. The trip will turn into an unpredictable and daring adventure, a symbol of an entire generation's desire for redemption.

programme.title: The Sword and the Cross
programme.desc: Mary Magdalene, torn between sin and salvation, embarks on a journey of faith and redemption.

programme.title: Looking for Paradise
programme.desc: Inspired by Vite di uomini non illustri by Giuseppe Pontiggia and directed by Mario Monicelli, this film follows Claudia Bertelli, born in Milan in 1949 to a middle-class family. Educated in England, Claudia's life unfolds through diverse roles: rebellious single mother, feminist, wife, doctor in developing countries, and finally a mystical nun. Each phase reflects changing ideals, forming a portrait of a woman exploring identity across different stages of her life.

programme.title: Getaway of Love
programme.desc: Giuliana leads a normal life; she has been married for 10 years to Martino, a less-than-passionate husband more devoted to his employment than to her. One day two thugs break into the supermarket where she works. A handsome policeman, Leonardo, comes to stop the robbery. A boundless attraction arises between the two, which will lead them to extreme choices in order to stay together.

programme.title: Bed of a thousand pleasure
programme.desc: A whimsical reimagining of the famous 1001 Nights, filled with intrigue, romance, and fantasy.

programme.title: Nightmare City
programme.desc: An airplane exposed to radiation lands, and blood drinking zombies emerge armed with knives, guns and teeth! They go on a rampage slicing, dicing, and biting their way across the Italian countryside.

programme.title: Wax: We Are The X
programme.desc: Gripping road movie, starring Rutger Hauer and Andrea Sartoretti. Two 30-year-old Italians and a Frenchwoman, after years of precariousness, go to the French Riviera to shoot a commercial and have one week to complete the assignment. The trip will turn into an unpredictable and daring adventure, a symbol of an entire generation's desire for redemption.

programme.desc: Mary Magdalene, torn between sin and salvation, embarks on a journey of faith and redemption.

Educated in England, Claudia's life unfolds through diverse roles: rebellious single mother, feminist, wife, doctor in developing countries, and finally a mystical nun.
